text:
AirPods 3rd Generation - Technical Specifications

Audio Technology
- Apple H1 chip
- Custom high-excursion Apple driver
- Custom high dynamic range amplifier
- Adaptive EQ
- Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
- Computational audio

Battery Life
- Up to 6 hours of listening time (single charge)
- Up to 4 hours of talk time (single charge)
- Up to 30 hours total with MagSafe Charging Case
- 5 minutes charge provides around 1 hour of listening time

Charging Case
- MagSafe Charging Case
- Lightning connector
- Qi-certified wireless charging compatible
- IPX4 sweat and water resistant (earbuds and case)

Sensors
- Dual beamforming microphones
- Inward-facing microphone
- Skin-detect sensor
- Motion-detecting accelerometer
- Speech-detecting accelerometer

Controls
- Press once to play, pause, or answer a call
- Press twice to skip forward
- Press three times to skip back
- Press and hold for Siri
- "Hey Siri" or just "Siri"

Connectivity
- Bluetooth 5.0
- Automatic device switching
- Audio Sharing between two sets of AirPods

Size and Weight
- Earbuds: 30.79 x 18.26 x 19.21 mm, 4.28 grams each
- MagSafe Charging Case: 46.40 x 54.40 x 21.38 mm, 37.91 grams

In the Box
- AirPods (3rd generation)
- MagSafe Charging Case
- Lightning to USB-C Cable
- Documentation

Accessibility
- Live Listen audio
- Headphone Accommodations
- Announce Notifications

Operating System Requirements
- iPhone and iPod touch models with iOS 15.1 or later
- iPad models with iPadOS 15.1 or later
- Apple Watch with watchOS 8.1 or later
- Mac with macOS Monterey 12.1 or later
- Apple TV with tvOS 15.1 or later

Price
- $169

Release Date
- October 2021

Key Features
- Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
- Adaptive EQ for personalized sound
- Longer battery life than previous generation
- Sweat and water resistant (IPX4)
- MagSafe charging
- Force sensor for easy control
- Contoured design for comfortable fit
- Automatic switching between devices

AirPods Max - Technical Specifications

Audio Technology
- Apple H1 chip in each ear cup
- Custom acoustic design
- 40 mm Apple-designed dynamic driver
- Active Noise Cancellation
- Transparency mode
- Adaptive EQ
- Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
- Computational audio

Battery Life
- Up to 20 hours of listening time with ANC or Transparency mode enabled
- Up to 20 hours of movie playback with spatial audio enabled
- Up to 20 hours of talk time with ANC enabled
- 5 minutes charge provides around 1.5 hours of listening time

Charging
- Lightning connector for charging
- Smart Case for ultra-low-power state

Sensors
- Nine microphones total
- Eight microphones for Active Noise Cancellation
- Three microphones for voice pickup
- Optical sensor (each ear cup)
- Position sensor (each ear cup)
- Case-detect sensor (each ear cup)
- Accelerometer (left ear cup)
- Gyroscope (left ear cup)

Controls
- Digital Crown for volume control, play/pause, skip tracks, answer/end calls, and activate Siri
- Noise control button to switch between Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode
- "Hey Siri" or just "Siri"

Connectivity
- Bluetooth 5.0
- Apple H1 chip for seamless device switching

Design
- Breathable knit mesh canopy
- Memory foam ear cushions
- Stainless steel frame and headband
- Telescoping arms
- Available in Space Gray, Silver, Pink, Green, Sky Blue

Size and Weight
- Height: 187.3 mm
- Width: 168.6 mm
- Depth: 83.4 mm
- Weight: 384.8 grams

In the Box
- AirPods Max
- Smart Case
- Lightning to USB-C Cable
- Documentation

Accessibility
- Live Listen audio
- Headphone Accommodations
- Announce Notifications

Operating System Requirements
- iPhone and iPod touch models with iOS 14.3 or later
- iPad models with iPadOS 14.3 or later
- Apple Watch with watchOS 7.2 or later
- Mac with macOS Big Sur 11.1 or later
- Apple TV with tvOS 14.3 or later

Price
- $549

Release Date
- December 2020

Key Features
- High-fidelity audio with computational audio
- Adaptive EQ for sound optimization
- Active Noise Cancellation with Transparency mode
- Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
- Premium materials and design
- Up to 20 hours of battery life
- Digital Crown for precise control
- Seamless switching between Apple devices

AirPods Pro 2nd Generation - Technical Specifications

Audio Technology
- Apple H2 chip
- Custom high-excursion Apple driver
- Custom high dynamic range amplifier
- Adaptive EQ
- Adaptive Audio
- Active Noise Cancellation
- Transparency mode
- Conversation Awareness
- Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking

Battery Life
- Up to 6 hours of listening time with ANC on (single charge)
- Up to 7 hours with ANC off
- Up to 30 hours total with MagSafe Charging Case
- 5 minutes charge provides around 1 hour of listening time

Charging Case
- MagSafe Charging Case with speaker and lanyard loop
- USB-C connector
- Compatible with Apple Watch charger
- Qi-certified wireless charging
- Built-in speaker for Find My
- IP54 dust, sweat, and water resistant (earbuds and case)

Sensors
- Dual beamforming microphones
- Inward-facing microphone
- Skin-detect sensor
- Motion-detecting accelerometer
- Speech-detecting accelerometer
- Touch control

Controls
- Press once to play, pause, or answer a call
- Press twice to skip forward
- Press three times to skip back
- Press and hold to switch between Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode
- Swipe volume control on stem
- "Hey Siri" or just "Siri"

Connectivity
- Bluetooth 5.3
- Find My network support
- Precision Finding with U1 chip in case

Size and Weight
- Earbuds: 30.9 x 21.8 x 24.0 mm, 5.3 grams each
- MagSafe Charging Case: 50.8 x 45.2 x 21.7 mm, 50.8 grams

In the Box
- AirPods Pro (2nd generation)
- MagSafe Charging Case (USB-C)
- Silicone ear tips (four sizes: XS, S, M, L)
- USB-C Charge Cable
- Documentation

Accessibility
- Live Listen audio
- Headphone Accommodations
- Conversation Boost

Operating System Requirements
- iPhone and iPod touch models with iOS 16 or later
- iPad models with iPadOS 16 or later
- Apple Watch with watchOS 9 or later
- Mac with macOS Ventura or later
- Apple TV with tvOS 16 or later

Price
- $249

Release Date
- September 2023 (USB-C version)

Key Features
- Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation
- Adaptive Audio dynamically adjusts noise control
- Personalized Spatial Audio
- USB-C charging
- Precision Finding
- Dust, sweat, and water resistant (IP54)

iMac 24-inch M3 - Technical Specifications

Display
- 24-inch 4.5K Retina display
- 4480-by-2520 resolution at 218 ppi
- 500 nits brightness
- Wide color (P3)
- True Tone technology

Chip
- Apple M3 chip
- 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores
- 8-core or 10-core GPU
- Hardware-accelerated ray tracing
- 16-core Neural Engine
- 100GB/s memory bandwidth

Storage
- Configurable to 256GB, 512GB, 1TB, or 2TB SSD

Memory
- 8GB, 16GB, or 24GB unified memory

Camera and Audio
- 1080p FaceTime HD camera
- Six-speaker system with force-cancelling woofers
- Wide stereo sound
- Spatial audio support with Dolby Atmos
- Studio-quality three-mic array with directional beamforming

Ports and Connectivity
Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports (or four on higher-end configurations):
- Charging
- DisplayPort
- Thunderbolt 3 (up to 40Gb/s)
- USB 4 (up to 40Gb/s)

Additional (on 4-port models):
- Two additional USB 3 ports
- Gigabit Ethernet

All models:
- 3.5 mm headphone jack
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Input Devices
- Magic Keyboard with Touch ID
- Magic Mouse or Magic Trackpad

Design
- Green, Yellow, Orange, Pink, Purple, Blue, Silver aluminum
- Ultra-thin 11.5 mm design
- Dimensions: 54.7 x 46.1 x 14.7 cm (with stand)
- Weight: 4.43 kg (4-port model)

Power
- 143W power adapter (4-port model)
- Built-in power supply

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $1,299

Release Date
- November 2023

Key Features
- Stunning 4.5K Retina display
- M3 chip with next-generation GPU
- Vibrant color options
- All-in-one design with minimal cables
- 1080p FaceTime camera
- Six-speaker sound system
- Compact and elegant footprint

iPhone 15 Pro Max - Technical Specifications

Display
- 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display
- 2796-by-1290-pixel resolution at 460 ppi
- ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz
- Always-On display
- Dynamic Island
- HDR display with 2000 nits peak brightness

Chip
- A17 Pro chip
- New 6-core CPU with 2 performance and 4 efficiency cores
- New 6-core GPU
- New 16-core Neural Engine

Camera System
- Pro camera system: 48MP Main, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto
- Main: ƒ/1.78 aperture
- Ultra Wide: ƒ/2.2 aperture
- Telephoto: ƒ/2.8 aperture with 5x optical zoom
- Next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control
- Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 5
- 4K video recording at 24 fps, 25 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps
- ProRes video recording up to 4K at 60 fps

Power and Battery
- Battery capacity: 4422 mAh
- Video playback: Up to 29 hours
- Video playback (streamed): Up to 25 hours
- Audio playback: Up to 95 hours
- Fast-charge capable: Up to 50% charge in around 30 minutes with 20W adapter or higher
- MagSafe wireless charging up to 15W
- Qi wireless charging up to 7.5W

Design and Build
- Titanium design with textured matte glass back
- Ceramic Shield front
- Action button
- Available in Natural Titanium, Blue Titanium, White Titanium, Black Titanium
- Dimensions: 159.9 x 76.7 x 8.25 mm
- Weight: 221 grams

Storage Options
- 256GB, 512GB, 1TB

Connectivity
- 5G capable
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3
- USB-C connector with USB 3 support
- Face ID for secure authentication

Operating System
- iOS 17

Price
- Starting at $1,199

Release Date
- September 2023

Key Features
- Titanium design with Action button
- A17 Pro chip for industry-leading performance
- 5x Telephoto camera for stunning close-ups
- Customizable Action button for quick access to features
- USB-C with USB 3 for faster transfers

iPhone 15 Pro - Technical Specifications

Display
- 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display
- 2556-by-1179-pixel resolution at 460 ppi
- ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz
- Always-On display
- Dynamic Island
- HDR display with 2000 nits peak brightness

Chip
- A17 Pro chip
- New 6-core CPU with 2 performance and 4 efficiency cores
- New 6-core GPU
- New 16-core Neural Engine

Camera System
- Pro camera system: 48MP Main, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto
- Main: ƒ/1.78 aperture
- Ultra Wide: ƒ/2.2 aperture
- Telephoto: ƒ/2.8 aperture with 3x optical zoom
- Next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control
- Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 5
- 4K video recording at 24 fps, 25 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps
- ProRes video recording up to 4K at 60 fps

Power and Battery
- Battery capacity: 3274 mAh
- Video playback: Up to 23 hours
- Video playback (streamed): Up to 20 hours
- Audio playback: Up to 75 hours
- Fast-charge capable: Up to 50% charge in around 30 minutes with 20W adapter or higher
- MagSafe wireless charging up to 15W
- Qi wireless charging up to 7.5W

Design and Build
- Titanium design with textured matte glass back
- Ceramic Shield front
- Action button
- Available in Natural Titanium, Blue Titanium, White Titanium, Black Titanium
- Dimensions: 146.6 x 70.6 x 8.25 mm
- Weight: 187 grams

Storage Options
- 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, 1TB

Connectivity
- 5G capable
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3
- USB-C connector with USB 3 support
- Face ID for secure authentication

Operating System
- iOS 17

Price
- Starting at $999

Release Date
- September 2023

Key Features
- Titanium design with Action button
- A17 Pro chip for industry-leading performance
- 3x Telephoto camera for optical zoom
- Customizable Action button
- USB-C with USB 3

iPhone 15 - Technical Specifications

Display
- 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display
- 2556-by-1179-pixel resolution at 460 ppi
- Dynamic Island
- HDR display with 1600 nits peak brightness
- True Tone display
- Wide color (P3)

Chip
- A16 Bionic chip
- 6-core CPU with 2 performance and 4 efficiency cores
- 5-core GPU
- 16-core Neural Engine

Camera System
- Advanced dual-camera system: 48MP Main and 12MP Ultra Wide
- Main: ƒ/1.6 aperture
- Ultra Wide: ƒ/2.4 aperture
- 2x Telephoto: 12MP, ƒ/1.6 aperture
- Next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control
- Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 5
- 4K video recording at 24 fps, 25 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps
- Cinematic mode up to 4K HDR at 30 fps

Power and Battery
- Battery capacity: 3349 mAh
- Video playback: Up to 20 hours
- Video playback (streamed): Up to 16 hours
- Audio playback: Up to 80 hours
- Fast-charge capable: Up to 50% charge in around 30 minutes with 20W adapter or higher
- MagSafe wireless charging up to 15W
- Qi wireless charging up to 7.5W

Design and Build
- Color-infused glass and aluminum design
- Ceramic Shield front
- Available in Pink, Yellow, Green, Blue, Black
- Dimensions: 147.6 x 71.6 x 7.80 mm
- Weight: 171 grams

Storage Options
- 128GB, 256GB, 512GB

Connectivity
- 5G capable
- Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3
- USB-C connector with USB 2 support
- Face ID for secure authentication

Operating System
- iOS 17

Price
- Starting at $799

Release Date
- September 2023

Key Features
- Dynamic Island for immersive experience
- 48MP Main camera for incredible detail
- USB-C connector
- Advanced camera system with 2x Telephoto
- All-day battery life

Mac Mini M2 Pro - Technical Specifications

Chip
- Apple M2 Pro chip
- 10-core CPU or 12-core CPU with up to 8 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores
- 16-core GPU or 19-core GPU
- 16-core Neural Engine
- 200GB/s memory bandwidth

Storage
- Configurable to 512GB, 1TB, 2TB, 4TB, or 8TB SSD

Memory
- 16GB or 32GB unified memory

Ports and Connectivity
Front:
- Two Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C) ports

Back:
- Two Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C) ports
- Two USB-A ports
- One HDMI port
- One Gigabit Ethernet port (configurable to 10Gb Ethernet)
- One 3.5 mm headphone jack

Wireless:
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Display Support
- Supports up to three displays
- Two displays with up to 6K resolution at 60Hz over Thunderbolt and one display with up to 4K resolution at 144Hz over HDMI

Audio
- 3.5 mm headphone jack with advanced support for high-impedance headphones

Power
- 150W power supply

Design
- Silver aluminum
- Dimensions: 19.7 x 19.7 x 3.6 cm
- Weight: 1.3 kg

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $1,299

Release Date
- January 2023

Key Features
- M2 Pro chip for powerful performance
- Compact design that fits anywhere
- Extensive connectivity with Thunderbolt 4
- Supports up to three displays
- Configurable Ethernet up to 10Gb
- Energy efficient

Mac Studio M2 Ultra - Technical Specifications

Chip
- Apple M2 Ultra chip
- 24-core CPU with 16 performance cores and 8 efficiency cores
- Up to 76-core GPU
- 32-core Neural Engine
- 800GB/s memory bandwidth
- Up to 192GB unified memory

Storage
- Configurable to 1TB, 2TB, 4TB, or 8TB SSD

Memory
- 64GB, 128GB, or 192GB unified memory

Ports and Connectivity
Front:
- Two Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C) ports
- One SDXC card slot

Back:
- Four Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C) ports
- Two USB-A ports
- One HDMI port
- One 10Gb Ethernet port
- One 3.5 mm headphone jack

Wireless:
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Display Support
- Supports up to six Pro Display XDRs
- Simultaneously supports up to five displays total
- Up to four 6K displays at 60Hz over Thunderbolt and one 4K display at 144Hz over HDMI

Audio
- High-fidelity six-speaker system
- Studio-quality three-mic array with directional beamforming
- 3.5 mm headphone jack with advanced support for high-impedance headphones

Power
- 295W power supply

Design
- Silver aluminum
- Dimensions: 19.7 x 19.7 x 9.5 cm
- Weight: 2.8 kg

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $3,999

Release Date
- June 2023

Key Features
- M2 Ultra chip for extraordinary performance
- Supports up to six displays
- Extensive connectivity with Thunderbolt 4
- Compact desktop design
- Professional-grade audio
- Advanced thermal system for sustained performance

MacBook Air 15-inch M2 - Technical Specifications

Display
- 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display
- 2880-by-1864 native resolution at 224 ppi
- 500 nits brightness
- Wide color (P3)
- True Tone technology

Chip
- Apple M2 chip
- 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores
- 10-core GPU
- 16-core Neural Engine
- 100GB/s memory bandwidth

Storage
- Configurable to 256GB, 512GB, 1TB, or 2TB SSD

Battery and Power
- Built-in 66.5-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery
- Up to 18 hours Apple TV app movie playback
- Up to 15 hours wireless web
- 35W Dual USB-C Port Power Adapter (or 70W USB-C Power Adapter)
- Fast-charge capable with 70W adapter

Memory
- 8GB, 16GB, or 24GB unified memory

Camera and Audio
- 1080p FaceTime HD camera
- Six-speaker sound system with force-cancelling woofers
- Wide stereo sound
- Spatial audio support with Dolby Atmos
- Three-mic array with directional beamforming

Ports and Connectivity
- Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports with support for charging, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt 3 (up to 40Gb/s), USB 4 (up to 40Gb/s)
- MagSafe 3 port
- 3.5 mm headphone jack
- Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Keyboard and Trackpad
- Backlit Magic Keyboard with 78 (U.S.) or 79 (ISO) keys including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys in an inverted‑T arrangement
- Touch ID sensor
- Force Touch trackpad

Design
- Midnight, Starlight, Space Gray, or Silver aluminum
- Dimensions: 34.04 x 23.76 x 1.15 cm
- Weight: 1.51 kg

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $1,299

Release Date
- June 2023

Key Features
- Spacious 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display
- Impossibly thin and light design
- M2 chip for fast performance
- Up to 18 hours of battery life
- Silent, fanless design

MacBook Pro 14-inch M3 - Technical Specifications

Display
- 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display
- 3024-by-1964 native resolution at 254 ppi
- XDR brightness: 1000 nits sustained, 1600 nits peak (HDR content only)
- ProMotion technology for adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz
- Wide color (P3)
- True Tone technology

Chip
- Apple M3 chip
- 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores
- 10-core GPU
- Hardware-accelerated ray tracing
- 16-core Neural Engine
- 100GB/s memory bandwidth

Storage
- Configurable to 512GB, 1TB, or 2TB SSD

Battery and Power
- Built-in 70-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery
- Up to 22 hours Apple TV app movie playback
- Up to 15 hours wireless web
- 70W USB-C Power Adapter
- Fast-charge capable with 96W adapter

Memory
- 8GB, 16GB, or 24GB unified memory

Camera and Audio
- 1080p FaceTime HD camera
- High-fidelity six-speaker sound system with force-cancelling woofers
- Wide stereo sound
- Spatial audio support with Dolby Atmos
- Studio-quality three-mic array with directional beamforming

Ports and Connectivity
- Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports with support for charging, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt 3 (up to 40Gb/s), USB 4 (up to 40Gb/s)
- HDMI port
- SDXC card slot
- MagSafe 3 port
- 3.5 mm headphone jack
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Keyboard and Trackpad
- Backlit Magic Keyboard with 78 (U.S.) or 79 (ISO) keys including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys in an inverted‑T arrangement
- Touch ID sensor
- Force Touch trackpad

Design
- Space Gray or Silver aluminum
- Dimensions: 31.26 x 22.12 x 1.55 cm
- Weight: 1.55 kg

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $1,599

Release Date
- November 2023

Key Features
- M3 chip with next-generation GPU
- Brilliant Liquid Retina XDR display
- All-day battery life
- Hardware-accelerated ray tracing
- Professional connectivity

MacBook Pro 16-inch M3 Max - Technical Specifications

Display
- 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display
- 3456-by-2234 native resolution at 254 ppi
- XDR brightness: 1000 nits sustained, 1600 nits peak (HDR content only)
- ProMotion technology for adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz
- Wide color (P3)
- True Tone technology

Chip
- Apple M3 Max chip
- Up to 16-core CPU with up to 12 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores
- Up to 40-core GPU
- Up to 128GB unified memory
- 400GB/s memory bandwidth
- 16-core Neural Engine

Storage
- Configurable to 1TB, 2TB, 4TB, or 8TB SSD

Battery and Power
- Built-in 100-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery
- Up to 22 hours Apple TV app movie playback
- Up to 15 hours wireless web
- 140W USB-C Power Adapter
- Fast-charge capable with 140W adapter

Memory
- 36GB, 48GB, 64GB, or 128GB unified memory

Camera and Audio
- 1080p FaceTime HD camera
- High-fidelity six-speaker sound system with force-cancelling woofers
- Wide stereo sound
- Spatial audio support with Dolby Atmos
- Studio-quality three-mic array with directional beamforming

Ports and Connectivity
- Three Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C) ports with support for charging, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt 4 (up to 40Gb/s), USB 4 (up to 40Gb/s)
- HDMI port
- SDXC card slot
- MagSafe 3 port
- 3.5 mm headphone jack
- Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
- Bluetooth 5.3

Keyboard and Trackpad
- Backlit Magic Keyboard with 78 (U.S.) or 79 (ISO) keys including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys in an inverted‑T arrangement
- Touch ID sensor
- Force Touch trackpad

Design
- Space Black or Silver aluminum
- Dimensions: 35.57 x 24.81 x 1.68 cm
- Weight: 2.16 kg

Operating System
- macOS Sonoma

Price
- Starting at $3,499

Release Date
- November 2023

Key Features
- M3 Max chip for extreme performance
- Longest battery life ever in a Mac
- Stunning Liquid Retina XDR display
- Advanced thermal architecture
- Professional connectivity with Thunderbolt 4
